body:
Comment 8: 
Ian, really appreciate for spending time with me to locate the cause of building issue.
I moved /usr/bin/awk(Solaris's default awk) to awk.old and the build script was able to
use /usr/gnu/bin/awk. Now the build is going on without the original error message.

Let me know if you want me to publish this success in golang-nuts or wiki page.
